articles.title: Football: France top group, Portugal squeeze into last 16 after 2-2 draw - CNA
articles.description: Two penalties from Cristiano Ronaldo helped holders Portugal squeeze into the last 16 of the European Championship after a 2-2 draw with France on Wednesday in a dramatic conclusion to Euro 2020 Group F.
